title: x_sysmon_hash
description: Hashes captured by Sysmon driver (field name in Sysmon is Hashes)

^MD5$.description: Specifies the MD5 message digest algorithm.

^SHA1$.description: Specifies the SHA­-1 (secure-­hash algorithm 1) cryptographic hash function.

^SHA256$.description: Specifies the SHA-­256 cryptographic hash function (part of the SHA­2 family).
